document_data.mainbody:
he House of Shyrrhr was the private residence of Piergeirons illustrous Lady of the Court, Shyrrhr.
This home was part of a rowhouse that stretched across Waterdeep Way, in the Castle Ward of Waterdeep.
The House of Shyrrhr stood three-stories tall.
This home was greatly furnished with carpets, lounge cushions, and a round bathing pool. It featured three bedrooms with round, canopied beds, one which had a closet the size of a room. And finally, there was a dining room where Shyrrhr entertained her guests. The pantry featured a secret tunnel that connected the home to Piergeirons Palace.
The only valuables for thieves to be find inside this home were a grand selection of fine wines, many precious gemstones that were roughly worth 20 gold pieces each, and Shyrrhrs fine gowns.
